langing.Getting Start: Getting start by uploading fundus images

detection.Name: Detection Tool
detection.Upload Instruction: Please drag and drop pictures in the box below or click select pictures button to add pictures.
detection.Upload Instruction2: Accepted File Types: .jpg, .jpeg, .png. Recommend uploaded picture under 20 pictures.
detection.Review Instruction: Please check the correctness of the pictures. You can edit the picture name in the box below each picture. Click the delete button on the top right of the picture to remove.
detection.Review Instruction2: To add more picture click add picture button. Recommend uploaded picture under 20 pictures.
detection.Review Instruction3: Click check button to start detection
detection.Drop Zone: Drag and drop pictures here, or click select pictures
